metadata.title: CVE-2022-45419 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: If the user added a security exception for an invalid TLS certificate,opened an ongoing TLS connection with a server that used that certificate,and then deleted the exception, Firefox would have kept the connectionalive, making it seem like the certificate was still trusted. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 107.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
